analysis.description:
ExoTownIco.distributeEtherByStage (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#531-550) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- mediatorWallet.transfer(_mediatorAmount) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#545-548)
	- developmentWallet.transfer(_devAmount - _mediatorAmount) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#548)
	- marketingWallet.transfer(_prAmount) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#549)
	- teamWallet.transfer(_balance - _devAmount - _prAmount) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#549-550)

Reentrancy in ExoTownIco.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#496-526):
	External calls:
	- exotownToken.emitTokens(_buyer,tokensToEmit) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#519-520)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- preSaleSoldTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#522-523)
	- privateSaleSoldTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#522-523)
	- publicSaleSoldTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0xf3eb09a1fd5a3e133a669074de1231d7a673744b.sol#522-523)
